description: The results are in from academic tests of 15-year-olds in 65 countries and regions. PISA shows Finland slipping, Vietnam doing […]
contentencoded:
The results are in from academic tests of 15-year-olds in 65 countries and regions. PISA shows Finland slipping, Vietnam doing well, and the United States still middle of the pack.


Guest: Jill Barshay, Contributing Editor, The Hechinger Report, and Founder and Editor of the Education by the Numbers blog.
